name: Planet Pouncers
description:
Welcome to Planet Pouncers, a game where four cats battle it out in a small galaxy by throwing fish at planets to make them explode!

How to play:

  • Each cat has three lives, which are lost when the cat falls out of the map
  • One Player controls their cat using the keyboard, while other players use controllers
  • A and D (Left stick on the controller) -  Move around the planets. Be careful to not fall off!
  • Spacebar ("A" on the controller) - Jump!
  • Q and E (Shoulders on the controller) - Move the crosshair around the cat
  • R ("Y") - Shoot fish in the direction of the crosshair
  • Planets explode after being hit by the fish, knocking away all cats that were standing on that planet!
  • Planets respawn after few seconds and so do cats, if they haven't run out of lives.

This is our first game and we hope you'll enjoy it despite some of it's flaws!
